question: The Desert National Park (DNP) is located in which state?
explanation: The Desert National Park (DNP) is located near Jaisalmer, Rajasthan and covers an area of 3162 kmÂ². The park is an excellent example of the ecosystem of the Thar Desert. The sand dunes form around 20% of the Park. It is home to desert fox, Bengal fox, desert cat, wolf, hedgehog, blackbuck and chinkara.
